name: Font.Weight
desc: A weight to use for fonts.

items.name: static func == (Font.Weight, Font.Weight) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two font weights are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two font weights are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the font weight by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the font weight.
